mapper.select: SELECT item_num, item_Category || '-' || LPAD(item_Num, 3, '0') as item_no, CASE WHEN item_category = '01' THEN '베스트상품' WHEN item_category = '02' THEN '찹쌀떡' WHEN item_category = '03' THEN '멥쌀떡' WHEN item_category = '04' THEN '떡케이크' END AS item_category, item_img, item_name, item_info, item_meterial, item_usedate, item_price FROM ITEMS ORDER BY item_no desc
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM ITEMS WHERE item_category = '01'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM ITEMS WHERE item_category = '02'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM ITEMS WHERE item_category = '03'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM ITEMS WHERE item_category = '04'

SELECT item_num, item_Category || '-' || LPAD(item_Num, 3, '0') as item_no, CASE WHEN item_category = '01' THEN '베스트상품' WHEN item_category = '02' THEN '찹쌀떡' WHEN item_category = '03' THEN '멥쌀떡' WHEN item_category = '04' THEN '떡케이크' END AS item_category, item_img, thumb_img, item_name, item_info, item_meterial, item_usedate, item_price FROM ITEMS WHERE item_num = #{itemNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEMS ( item_num, item_category, item_img, thumb_img, item_name, item_info, item_meterial, item_usedate, item_price ) VALUES ( itemnum_seq.NEXTVAL, #{itemCategory}, #{itemImg}, #{thumbImg}, #{itemName}, #{itemInfo}, #{itemMeterial}, #{itemUsedate}, #{itemPrice} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEMS SET item_name = #{itemName}, item_category = #{itemCategory}, item_img = #{itemImg}, thumb_img = #{thumbImg}, item_info = #{itemInfo}, item_meterial = #{itemMeterial}, item_usedate = #{itemUsedate}, item_price = #{itemPrice} WHERE item_num = #{itemNum}
